Description:
Detect DLL deletions from Spooler Service driver folder. This might be a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2021-1675

Author: Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential PrintNightmare Exploitation Attempt
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\spoolsv.exe' and filepath like '%c:\windows\system32\spool\drivers\x64\3\%'
